announcement_body.headline: Dota 2 Update - 08/22/2025
body: [p]Over the last few days we've addressed the following issues:[/p][list][*][p]Fixed emoticons from previous fan content bundles that were supposed to be permanent being unavailable[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed basic talent stickers all looking like a specific player sticker from 2022[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed accounts ineligible to participate in The International Predictions & Fantasy being able to circumvent the rules[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed one prediction being missing for Road to the International: Playoffs on certain resolutions[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed rare client crash when viewing your fantasy roster[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed common client crash when viewing anything on a mac[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed the Tyrian Regalia item "Tyrian Bloodfeather Feast" incorrectly showing as owned if the player had the Queen of Pain Arcana[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed sales of Talent Sticker Bundles not contributing to the prize pool[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed bots in locally hosted matches not purchasing any items[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed default Pudge bot never casting Meat Hook[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Arc Warden's Tempest Double being able to summon a Tempest Double by capturing an experience shrine on the double, gaining a level, and then skilling Tempest Double[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Meepo's Poof ocassionally inadverently getting into the wrong alt-cast state[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Nature Prophet's Teleport and Io's Relocate using the wrong sounds when the teleport finishes[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Silencer's Last Word not triggering Spell Absorbtion, Phylactery or Khanda[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Troll Warlord's Fervor incorrectly granting bonus attack speed and gaining stacks when Troll Warlord is broken[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed Troll Warlord's Berserker's Rage incorrectly granting bonus stats when Troll Warlord is broken[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed rare server crash with Witch Doctor's Death Ward[/p][/*][*][p]Fixed rare crash with Marci's Dispose[/p][/*][/list]
